history.text: Hello! What's the name of the movie?
Hi, the movie is John Wick. Have you seen it?
Yes, I've seen that one. What did you think of it?
Well, I really like Keanu Reeves in most of his movies, so that was already a plus going in. But, I thought it was a pretty good action movie. What about you?

I like Keanu Reeves too, and I understood why he felt the need for revenge. It was just a little too violent for my taste
s.
Yes, it was a bit violent. The killing of the puppy that was a gift from his deceased wife was especially upsetting to me, very sad.
Yes, that part really sticks with me as well. Even when I've forgotten most of the parts of the plot, I remember that. :(
Yes, same for me, that really stuck with me. I didn't care so much his vintage car was stolen, even if he apparently did lol.
Ah, yes, my husband was upset about the car! I'd forgotten all about it. :D I wouldn't care about the car either.
I don't know much about the director, Chad Stahelski, I haven't heard of him directing other movies but seems violent may be his style.
I don't know anything about him... I saw the other day that there's a sequel to the movie. I was surprised there was anyone left for John Wick to kill. ;) :D
True! His assassin nickname was an odd choice, "Baba Yaga". I have no idea exactly what it means, do you?
I don't know what that means. My son had a book when he was little, called "Too Many Babas". I bet that's a different kind of Baba, though. ;)
lol, I think you might be right. If you recall, the son (Losef) of the head of the Russian crime syndicate is the one that committed the theft, so sure he thought he would get away with it.
I didn't recall that.... I remember being intrigued at the idea of a Russian mafia... I had't known much about it before.
Yes, I felt that the actor that was the big man, Michael Nygvist (Viggo) did a good job portraying that role.
I'm feel like I might want to watch the sequel, now that I've been reminded of some of the plot in the first movie.

I think I will. I liked it when the woman assassin, Ms. Perkins, 
sneaked in Wick's room and tried to assassin him, but of course she failed.
I don't even remember that! I think I will read a syopsis of the movie before watching the sequel.
I also could imagine it would be very difficult for the father Viggo to have to tell John Wick where his son was, knowing he was going to kill him!
I imagine it would!! I am very protective of my son!
Exactly! But, he was able to avenge his wife, since the puppy was what he had left of her.
Yes, I feel like my husband would probably want to do the same in the circumstances, although he probably wouldn't try it!!
But, he did get a pit bull puppy at the end, that was going to be euthanized so that was sweet.
Yes, what a sweet ending. :)
Oh, and he ended up killing Viggo, after he actually let him stab him!
You were right at the beginning though, it was pretty violent.
Still there?

It's been 10 minutes and there hasn't been a response so appears the other user has aborted the task, even though we were almost finished. I will have to abort conversation, as I don't know what else to do. My ID# A3NMQ3019X6YE0

uid2response.feedback: I talked with the person leaving 12 comments. The "finish" button never activated until after the person left the conversation.
